entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
